column1: (Mandatory) Simulation should be updated through the task_based_updater (task) or log_based_updater (log)
(Optional) Start ACT-R from csv2actr (yes) or start externally (default external start)
(Mandatory) Filename and relative path of data or task specification (from the folder in which meta_info.csv is)
(Optional) Filename and relative path of cognitive model specifications
(Mandatory) Filename and relative path of cognitive model
(Mandatory) Filename and relative path of windows specification
(Mandatory) Filename and relative path of buttons specification
(Mandatory) Filename and relative path of images specification
(Mandatory) Filename and relative path of windows label mapping
(Mandatory) Filename and relative path of sounds label mapping
(Optional) Filename and relative path of any outputs (in case results should not appear in )
(Optional) Column separator (if semicolon (leave empty))
(Optional) Starting time (in seconds) at which first event/ item should be scheduled (default 1)
(Optional) Sampling rate in hz (log based updating) or time interval in msec between presented items (task based updating)
(Optional) Skip rate in log file in rows
(Optional) Column start idx in dataset
(Optional) show environment windows
(Optional) show display labels (only has effect if 'show environment windows is 'yes')
(Optional) Number of decimal in values (default 2)
(Optional) time interval to new value in msc (default 1)
(Optional) simulate with human interaction
(Optional) Time to run simulation in seconds (default 1000, if dependent on length of log file, write 0)
(Optional) Run actr simulation full time (if no, simulation might end before if no events to process)
(Optional) Run actr simulation real time
(Optional) Turn off console output (default no)
(Optional) Filename and relative path of console output
